blocks.name: epoo
blocks.content: The sum of an even and an odd is odd. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jul-2020.)

blocks.name: emoo
blocks.content: The difference of an even and an odd is odd. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm emoo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), codd))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cmin, c1), codd, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, ceven))
  evenz(c0)
  zcnd(c1, wcel(c1, codd))
  oddz(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, codd), wcel(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), codd), wcel(cneg(c1), codd))
  onego(c1)
  epoo(c0, cneg(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm emoo(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Odd)→(c0[-]c1)∈ Odd)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[-]c1), codd, (c0[+]-u(c1)), (c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Odd))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ Odd, (c0[+]-u(c1))=(c0[-]c1), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c0, c0 ∈ Even)
  evenz(c0)
  zcnd(c1, c1 ∈ Odd)
  oddz(c1)
  negsub(c0, c1)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ Odd, (c0[+]-u(c1))∈ Odd, -u(c1)∈ Odd)
  onego(c1)
  epoo(c0, -u(c1))
}

blocks.name: epee
blocks.content: The sum of two even numbers is even. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm epee(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), ceven))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), codd), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), codd))
  evenp1odd(c0)
  evenm1odd(c1)
  opoeALTV(co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(c1, cmin, nat1))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)), wb(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, ceven))
  evenz(c0)
  1cnd(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcnd(c1, wcel(c1, ceven))
  evenz(c1)
  eleq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), ceven, co(c0, caddc, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  ppncan(c0, nat1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm epee(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Even)→(c0[+]c1)∈ Even)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Even), (c0[+]c1)∈ Even, ((c0[+]1)[+](c1[-]1))∈ Even)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ Even, ((c0[+]1)[+](c1[-]1))∈ Even, (c0[+]1)∈ Odd, (c1[-]1)∈ Odd)
  evenp1odd(c0)
  evenm1odd(c1)
  opoeALTV((c0[+]1), (c1[-]1))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Even), (((c0[+]1)[+](c1[-]1))∈ Even ↔(c0[+]c1)∈ Even), c0 ∈ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ Even, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c0, c0 ∈ Even)
  evenz(c0)
  1cnd((c0 ∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Even))
  adantl(c0 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ Even, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c1, c1 ∈ Even)
  evenz(c1)
  eleq1d(((c0[+]1)[+](c1[-]1)), ceven, (c0[+]c1), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ 1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  ppncan(c0, nat1, c1)
}

blocks.name: evensumeven
blocks.content: If a summand is even, the other summand is even iff the sum is even. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm evensumeven(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven), wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven)))
  expcom(wcel(c1, ceven), wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven))
  epee(c0, c1)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven), wcel(c0, ceven))
  eqeltrrd(c0, ceven, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  zcnd(c1, wcel(c1, ceven))
  evenz(c1)
  pncan(c0, c1)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven)), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), ceven), wa(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)))
  ancomd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven), wcel(c1, ceven))
  anim1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), ceven), wcel(c1, ceven))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ceven))
  emee(co(c0, caddc, c1), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm evensumeven(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even)→(c0 ∈ Even ↔(c0[+]c1)∈ Even))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even), c0 ∈ Even, (c0[+]c1)∈ Even)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ Even, (c0 ∈ Even →(c0[+]c1)∈ Even))
  expcom(c1 ∈ Even, c0 ∈ Even, (c0[+]c1)∈ Even)
  epee(c0, c1)
  ex((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even), (c0[+]c1)∈ Even, c0 ∈ Even)
  eqeltrrd(c0, ceven, ((c0[+]c1)[-]c1), ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even)∧(c0[+]c1)∈ Even))
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even), (c0[+]c1)∈ Even, ((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)= c0)
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ Even, ((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)= c0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c0)
  zcnd(c1, c1 ∈ Even)
  evenz(c1)
  pncan(c0, c1)
  syl(((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even)∧(c0[+]c1)∈ Even), ((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)∈ Even, ((c0[+]c1)∈ Even ∧ c1 ∈ Even))
  ancomd(((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even)∧(c0[+]c1)∈ Even), (c0[+]c1)∈ Even, c1 ∈ Even)
  anim1i((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ Even), (c0[+]c1)∈ Even, c1 ∈ Even)
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ Even)
  emee((c0[+]c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: evenprm2
blocks.content: A prime number is even iff it is 2. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm evenprm2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cprime), wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, nat2)))
} = {
  impbid1(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, nat2))
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, cprime), wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, nat2))), wceq(c0, nat2))
  2a1(wceq(c0, nat2), wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c0, ceven))
  ex(wn(wceq(c0, nat2)), wcel(c0, cprime), wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, nat2)))
  3syl(wa(wn(wceq(c0, nat2)), wcel(c0, cprime)), wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, nat2)), wcel(c0, cdif(cprime, csn(nat2))), wcel(c0, codd))
  sylibr(wa(wn(wceq(c0, nat2)), wcel(c0, cprime)), wcel(c0, cdif(cprime, csn(nat2))), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)))
  ancoms(wn(wceq(c0, nat2)), wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, cprime), wn(wceq(c0, nat2)), wne(c0, nat2))
  biimpri(wn(wceq(c0, nat2)), wne(c0, nat2))
  df-ne(c0, nat2)
  eldifsn(c0, cprime, nat2)
  oddprmALTV(c0)
  pm2.21d(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(c0, nat2))
  oddneven(c0)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, nat2), wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(nat2, ceven))
  2evenALTV()
  eleq1(c0, nat2, ceven)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm evenprm2(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Prime →(c0 ∈ Even ↔ c0 = 2))
} = {
  impbid1(c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈ Even, c0 = 2)
  pm2.61i((c0 ∈ Prime →(c0 ∈ Even → c0 = 2)), c0 = 2)
  2a1(c0 = 2, c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈ Even)
  ex(¬ c0 = 2, c0 ∈ Prime, (c0 ∈ Even → c0 = 2))
  3syl((¬ c0 = 2 ∧ c0 ∈ Prime), (c0 ∈ Even → c0 = 2), c0 ∈(Prime \ { 2 }), c0 ∈ Odd)
  sylibr((¬ c0 = 2 ∧ c0 ∈ Prime), c0 ∈(Prime \ { 2 }), (c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2))
  ancoms(¬ c0 = 2, c0 ∈ Prime, (c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2))
  anim2i(c0 ∈ Prime, ¬ c0 = 2, c0 ≠ 2)
  biimpri(¬ c0 = 2, c0 ≠ 2)
  df-ne(c0, nat2)
  eldifsn(c0, cprime, nat2)
  oddprmALTV(c0)
  pm2.21d(c0 ∈ Odd, c0 ∈ Even, c0 = 2)
  oddneven(c0)
  mpbiri(c0 = 2, c0 ∈ Even, 2 ∈ Even)
  2evenALTV()
  eleq1(c0, nat2, ceven)
}

blocks.name: oddprmne2
blocks.content: Every prime number not being 2 is an odd prime number. (Contributed by AV, 21-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm oddprmne2(class c0) {
  |- wb(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c0, codd)), wcel(c0, cdif(cprime, csn(nat2))))
} = {
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c0, codd)), wcel(c0, cdif(cprime, csn(nat2))), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wne(c0, nat2)))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c0, codd), wne(c0, nat2))
  con4bid(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c0, codd), wne(c0, nat2))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cprime), wn(wcel(c0, codd)), wn(wne(c0, nat2)), wceq(c0, nat2))
  bitr3d(wcel(c0, cprime), wn(wcel(c0, codd)), wceq(c0, nat2), wcel(c0, ceven))
  syl(wcel(c0, cprime), wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd))), wcel(c0, cz))
  prmz(c0)
  zeo2ALTV(c0)
  evenprm2(c0)
  nne(c0, nat2)
  eldifsn(c0, cprime, nat2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oddprmne2(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈ Odd)↔ c0 ∈(Prime \ { 2 }))
} = {
  bitr4i((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ∈ Odd), c0 ∈(Prime \ { 2 }), (c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c0 ≠ 2))
  pm5.32i(c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈ Odd, c0 ≠ 2)
  con4bid(c0 ∈ Prime, c0 ∈ Odd, c0 ≠ 2)
  syl6bbr(c0 ∈ Prime, ¬ c0 ∈ Odd, ¬ c0 ≠ 2, c0 = 2)
  bitr3d(c0 ∈ Prime, ¬ c0 ∈ Odd, c0 = 2, c0 ∈ Even)
  syl(c0 ∈ Prime, (c0 ∈ Even ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ Odd), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  prmz(c0)
  zeo2ALTV(c0)
  evenprm2(c0)
  nne(c0, nat2)
  eldifsn(c0, cprime, nat2)
}

blocks.name: evenltle
blocks.content: If an even number is greater than another even number, then it is greater than or equal to the other even number plus 2. (Contributed by AV, 25-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm evenltle(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat2), cle, c0))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat2), cle, c0))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat2), cle, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c0))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c0)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  zltp1le(c1, c0)
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c0), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat2), cle, c0), wo(wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), clt, c0), wceq(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c0)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(c1, ceven), wb(wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cle, c0), wo(wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), clt, c0), wceq(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c0))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  syl(wcel(c1, ceven), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zred(c1, wcel(c1, ceven))
  peano2re(c1)
  zred(c0, wcel(c0, ceven))
  leloe(co(c1, caddc, nat1), c0)
